abstract.text: Presents a modal Save panel to the user, then tries to save the document if the user approves the operation.

inlineContent.text: The type of save operation.
The delegate to which the selector message is sent.
The selector of the message sent to the delegate.
Object passed with the callback to provide any additional context information.
When saving is completed, regardless of success or failure, or has been canceled, sends the message selected by
to the

as the last argument. The method selected by

action methods. The default implementation of this method first makes sure that any editor registered using the Cocoa Bindings
informal protocol has committed its changes, then creates a Save panel, adds a standard file format accessory view (if there is more than one file type for the user to choose from and

For backward binary compatibility with Mac OS v10.3 and earlier, the default implementation of this method instead invokes the deprecated
if it is overridden, even if the user cancels the panel.

abstract.text: Construct and manage a graphical, event-driven user interface for your macOS app.
An abstract class that defines the interface for macOS documents.
Constants for specifying the type of document-save operation to perform.
A Boolean value that indicates whether the user chose to hide the document’s filename extension.
The file type that was last selected in the Save panel.
Tells the document to customize the specified Save panel.
Presents a modal Save panel to the user, then tries to save the document if the user approves the operation.
Saves the contents of the document to a file or file package located by a URL, that is formatted to a specified type, for a particular kind of save operation.
Saves the document and delivers the results to the provided delegate object.
The action method invoked in the receiver as first responder when the user chooses the Save As menu command.
The action method invoked in the receiver as first responder when the user chooses the Save To menu command.
Called after the user has been given the opportunity to select a destination through the modal Save panel.
A Boolean value that indicates whether the document’s Save panel displays a list of supported writable document types.
A set of methods that controllers can implement to enable an editor view to inform the controller when it has uncommitted changes.
Defines an opaque type that represents a method selector.
A singleton actor whose executor is equivalent to the main dispatch queue.
A raw pointer for accessing and manipulating untyped data.

inlineContent.text: The type of save operation.
The delegate to which the selector message is sent.
The selector of the message sent to the delegate.
Object passed with the callback to provide any additional context information.
